price: Hakika nalijua ya kuwa nitapokea hisabu yangu.
footnotes: Mimi nilikuwa na yakini tangu duniani kuwa nitapata hisabu yangu, basi nikajitayarisha nafsi yangu kwa mkutano huu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
